name: ordercloud-javascript-sdk
description: JavaScript SDK autogenerated from swagger spec using the Swagger-CodeGen project
author: Four51 Inc. <ordercloud@four51.com>

scripts.README: you MUST temporarily remove 'browser' from package.json before regenerating. It messes up build because browserify looks at that instead of ./src/index.js
scripts.README2: remember to add back browser, its helpful for Webpack and other build systems to read the entry and choose the correct file based on the target.
scripts.build: npm run concat && npm run minify
